sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Walmart topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Walmart registers a 4.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 7.3%.
Home Depot is lower by about 33.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola, trading down 7.3%, and Microsoft, trading up 1.6% on the day.
